name: From Italy with love: Tasting men√∫ paired with italian wines.
description:
Join the latest culinary trend of immersive and social dining where local hosts invite you into their homes for a magical meal.

During this dinner, you'll feel the heart of Italy in every bite. We don't want you arrive to our place and just sit down in a table, we want you feel as a home and enjoy how we live the dinner moment in Italy, tasting Italian wines, welcoming you with an Italian aperitivo and to have a nice conversation in an elegant but relaxed atmosphere, with a selection of Italian recipes with a little tweak but keeping their Italian essence.
